backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that combines blob storage and authorization mixins to manage user profiles, contact form submissions, photos, and videos with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying a single task: remove the last 3 static photos (gallery-photo-28 through gallery-photo-30) from the hardcoded array in Gallery.tsx, leaving only gallery-photo-01 through gallery-photo-27.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short human-readable summaries describing each file's purpose and key content.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router tree with routes for Home, About, Programs, Donations, Gallery, Contact, and Admin pages all nested under a Layout root route.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Manavdeep Seva Trust branding, quick navigation links, founder/contact details, copyright, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that renders the Navigation header, a flex-growing Outlet for page content, and the Footer.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation bar with the trust logo, desktop and mobile menus for six public routes, and a conditionally shown Admin link when the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP actor using TanStack Query, switching between anonymous and identity-authenticated actors and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including contact form submission, photo/video upload, fetching all photos/videos, and deleting photos/videos.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm, earthy CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying the organization's founder info, history, mission, and values with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page that requires Internet Identity authentication and provides UI for uploading/deleting photos and videos via tabbed forms with progress feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying organization contact details and a form for submitting inquiries, using the useContactForm mutation hook with success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Donations.tsx: Donations page for Manavdeep Seva Trust displaying impact statistics, preset donation amounts with descriptions, and payment method options (UPI, bank transfer, card) with a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page that displays a static list of 30+ activity photos alongside dynamically fetched photos and videos via React Query hooks, organized in tabs for photos and videos.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page for GreenStripe Trust featuring a hero banner, founder profile section, and mission statement with links to programs and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/Programs.tsx: Programs page listing six trust initiatives (Education, Environment, Healthcare, Community Development, Skill Development, Sustainable Agriculture) in a responsive card grid with icons and detail bullets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, border radius, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Manavdeep Seva Trust website project at version 31, listing existing features, known issues (founder photo cropping, gallery display), architectural notes, and feature/requirement mappings.
